description:
Since our founding in Little Rock, Arkansas, in 2011, the Reddick Moss law firm has provided unmatched advocacy and support to a broad range of clients throughout the United States. We have become one of the country's premier legal practices for those who are dealing with complex, pressing legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Nursing home abuse and neglect
  • Catastrophic injuries
  • Wrongful death
  • Tractor-trailer wrecks
  • Product liability
  • Premises liability
  • Medical and hospital negligence

Staffed with a team of some of the most talented and experienced minds in the profession, our law firm has achieved remarkable success. As evidence of this, we now have three additional law offices across the country, located Colorado, New Mexico and Pennsylvania. Over the course of our history, we have recovered more than $500 million in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, and our attorneys have more than 50 years of combined legal experience to help increase your chances of obtaining the justice you deserve.

Honored for our success, our founding lawyers are AV Preeminent peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell and our lawyers have earned many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers. We are also members of the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forums, and we are fully committed to helping you through this difficult and stressful time in your life with the utmost compassion and integrity.

To begin the process of seeking compensation, you can contact Reddick Moss to schedule a free initial consultation.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary.

Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
